name: ping
description: Replies Pong! and includes an average latency

name: ban
description: Bans a Member from the Discord.

options.name: user
options.description: Ban a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their ban

options.name: mention
options.description: Ban a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their ban

name: kick
description: Kicks a Member from the Discord.

options.name: user
options.description: Kick a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their kick

options.name: mention
options.description: Kick a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their kick

name: mute
description: Mute a user, applying a role that stops them from speaking.

options.name: user
options.description: Mute a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: duration
options.description: Mute Duration. Accepted Formats: 1h (1 Hour), 15m (15 Minutes), 1d (1 Day) etc.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their mute

options.name: mention
options.description: Mute a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: duration
options.description: Mute Duration. Accepted Formats: 1h (1 Hour), 15m (15 Minutes), 1d (1 Day) etc.

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their mute

options.name: user
options.description: Unmute a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: mention
options.description: Unmute a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

name: config
description: Enables admins to change certain values or behaviours.

options.name: muterole
options.description: The Role to apply to users when /mute-d.

options.name: role
options.description: @Role Mentionable of the Mute Role.

options.name: logchannel
options.description: The channel to log bot interactions to.

options.name: channel
options.description: #Channel Mentionable of the new Log Channel

options.name: logs
options.description: The channel to log bot interactions to.

options.name: usermigration
options.description: Logs user migration (joins/leaves)

options.name: enable
options.description: Whether or not to enable this log

options.name: messagedelete
options.description: Logs when messages are deleted

options.name: enable
options.description: Whether or not to enable this log

options.name: messageedit
options.description: Logs when messages are edited

options.name: enable
options.description: Whether or not to enable this log

options.name: voicestate
options.description: Logs when users move voice channels

options.name: enable
options.description: Whether or not to enable this log

options.name: rolechanges
options.description: Logs when users change their roles

options.name: enable
options.description: Whether or not to enable this log

options.name: autorole
options.description: A role that will be automatically assigned to the user upon joining

options.name: role
options.description: @Role Mentionable of the Role to automatically assign

options.name: welcomemsg
options.description: A message that will be automatically sent to the user upon joining

options.name: message
options.description: The message to send

options.name: blacklist
options.description: Configure Auto-Mod Blacklist Words and Phrases

options.name: add
options.description: Add a blacklisted word or phrase

options.name: phrase
options.description: The word or phrase to add

options.name: list
options.description: List all blacklisted words and phrases

options.name: remove
options.description: Remove a blacklisted word or phrase

options.name: blacklistid
options.description: The ID of the word or phrase to remove (see /config blacklist list)

name: userinfo
description: View your own (or a targets) user information

options.name: member
options.description: Optional target @member

options.name: userid
options.description: User ID of the target

name: reactrole
description: Create, modify and delete reaction roles

options.name: init
options.description: Initialize a React Role Base Message

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to initialize the Base Message

options.name: message
options.description: The text you want the Base Message to display

options.name: add
options.description: Add a reaction to an initialized Base Message.

options.name: messageid
options.description: The ID of the pre-initialized Base Message to add to

options.name: reactionemoji
options.description: The emoji you wish to add

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to associate with this emoji

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a Base Message

options.name: messageid
options.description: The ID of the Base Message you want to delete

options.name: user
options.description: Warn a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their warn

options.name: mention
options.description: Warn a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for their warn

name: tag
description: Allows the creation, modification or deletion of custom tags.

options.name: create
options.description: Create a new tag.

options.name: name
options.description: Name for the tag.

options.name: response
options.description: Response that the tag will give when triggered. Use %AUTH, %CHAN, %GULD for replacements

options.name: modify
options.description: The channel to log bot interactions to.

options.name: access
options.description: Add *either* a role or member to give or revoke access.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: role
options.description: @Role of the role to enable/disable access.

options.name: userid
options.description: @Mention of the user to enable/disable access.

options.name: response
options.description: Modify the response string to the tag.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: text
options.description: The new response string.

options.name: name
options.description: Rename an already existing command.

options.name: old-name
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: new-name
options.description: The new name for this tag

options.name: channels
options.description: The channels in which this command is allowed to be run.

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to update. Must already exist.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to enable/disable usage in.

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a tag

options.name: tag
options.description: Tag name to delete

options.name: info
options.description: Show an embed with the settings for this command

options.name: tag
options.description: The tag to view. Must already exist.

options.name: list
options.description: List all embeds in the guild, as well as their responses.

name: lobbyhub
description: Create a lobby hub channel to allow users to create their own channels when needed.

options.name: create
options.description: Create a new lobby hub channel using an existing voice channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to use as the hub channel

options.name: parent
options.description: The parent (category) to spawn channels under

options.name: delete
options.description: Remove the lobby system from an existing hub channel. This will not delete the base voice channel.

options.name: channel
options.description: The hub channel you want to remove lobbies from

name: lobby
description: Modify a user's lobby in this guild

options.name: modify
options.description: Modify certain lobby settings

options.name: size
options.description: Modify the max size of your lobby

options.name: size
options.description: The new size of your lobby. Must be between 1 and 99 inclusive.

options.name: locked
options.description: Lock or unlock your lobby

options.name: toggle
options.description: True to lock, False to unlock.

name: divider
description: Automatically add and remove roles if the member has roles within a certain range.

options.name: add
options.description: Register a new auto-divider

options.name: divider-role
options.description: The role to apply to the user

options.name: top-role
options.description: The role at the top of the range

options.name: bottom-role
options.description: The role at the bottom of the range

options.name: remove
options.description: Un-register a new auto-divider

options.name: divider-role
options.description: The role to un-register

name: infraction
description: List or rescind a user's infractions

options.name: list
options.description: List a user's infractions, by type

options.name: user
options.description: List a user by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: mention
options.description: List a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: revoke
options.description: Revoke an infraction from a user.

options.name: user
options.description: Select by User ID

options.name: userid
options.description: The Users Unique Snowflake ID

options.name: infractionid
options.description: The ID of the Infraction

options.name: mention
options.description: Select a user my mention

options.name: member
options.description: The Users @Mention

options.name: infractionid
options.description: The ID of the Infraction
